message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.DS, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with the problem of MAP inference for general energy functions, which is a common problem in machine learning and computer vision. The proposed method involves a novel relaxation technique that combines LP and QP, which are commonly used in optimization and machine learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.CV (Computer Vision). The paper also involves algorithms based on belief propagation and dual decomposition, which are commonly used in the sub-categories of cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.IT (Information Theory).
